ygData.subject: Re: Large Ruby
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrm, Thats odd. Crappy too. I feel like emailing the guys over at EQ lizer and asking them where the heck they got the ruby from in innothule swamp. The only
ygData.messageBody:
Hrm,

Thats odd. Crappy too. I feel like emailing the guys over at EQ'lizer and
asking them where the heck they got the ruby from in innothule swamp.

The only mob that i have heard of that drops a ruby is the fish called
Chomper or something of the like in the rivervale lake. Someone posted that
a few weeks ago on this list. Im not sure how hard of a mob he is but i can
imagine killing a fish isnt too too easy. Especially one that drops rubies.

Anyway if someone finds out what drops this ruby in Innothule be sure to let
me know.

Thanks

John

> ----------
> From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 1:41 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Large Ruby
>
> From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
> The only way I know of to complete the quest you are working on is to
> purchase the ruby from a gem dealer for aroudn 150p.
>
> If you discover the mob that drobs rubies, or another location to find
> one,
> please share.
>
